# Satellites for Peat's Sake 

Flow Country, Scotland

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. This mosaic, acquired on 28 May 2018, offers a rare cloud-free view over the vast expanses of Scotland's Flow Country.
slides.caption: This mosaic, acquired on 28 May 2018, offers a rare cloud-free view over the vast expanses of Scotland's Flow Country.

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. This high-resolution land cover map derived from Copernicus Sentinel-2 data shows the extent of peatland in purple.
slides.caption: This high-resolution land cover map derived from Copernicus Sentinel-2 data shows the extent of peatland in purple.

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. A massive fire burned 5,700 hectares of peatland in 2019. This image was taken on 16 May.
slides.caption: A massive fire burned 5,700 hectares of peatland in 2019. This image was taken on 16 May.

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. False colour image including the near-infrared channel hihglights healthy vegetation in red and shows the burn scar in dark brown.
slides.caption: False colour image including the near-infrared channel highlights healthy vegetation in red and shows the burn scar in dark brown.

slides.altText: Satellites for peat's sake. False colour image including the shortwave infrared channels highlights the active fire front in bright red.
slides.caption: False colour image including the shortwave infrared channels highlights the active fire front in bright red.
